item.Q:
Write the character:
radical (chem.); root; basis; classifier for instrument strings
item.A:
gēn
根据 (根據) gēnjù according to; based on; basis; foundation

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: offer (information etc); supply
2: offer; sacrificial offering; trial statement; confession
item.A:
1: gōng 2: gòng
提供 tígōng to supply; to provide; to furnish 供电 (供電) gòngdiàn electricity supply

item.Q:

cut short; extinct; to disappear; to vanish; absolutely; by no means
item.A:
绝 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 絕
jué
绝对 (絕對) juéduì absolute; unconditional

qiān
一千 yīqiān one thousand

kè
客观 (客觀) kèguān objective

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: close to
2: to cut; to slice
item.A:
1: qiè 2: qiē
一切 yíqiè all 密切 mìqiē familiar

item.Q:
Write the character:
to gather; to collect; collected works; (classifier for episodes, e.g. of TV series)
item.A:
jí
集中 jízhōng to concentrate; to centralize; to focus; centralized; concentrated; to put together

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to claim
2: balanced; to fit; well-off; suitable
item.A:
称 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 稱
1: chēng 2: chèn

item.Q:
Write the character:
according to; to act in accordance with; to depend on; to seize; to occupy
item.A:
traditional: 據
jù
根据 (根據) gēnjù according to; based on; basis; foundation

item.Q:
Write the character:
alight; to fall; to drop (behind)
item.A:
落 (strokes unavailable)
luò
落后 (落後) luòhòu to fall behind; to lag (in technology etc); backward; to retrogress

item.Q:
Write the character:
to exceed; to climb over; to surpass; the more ... the more
item.A:
yuè
越冬 yuèdōng (v) go through the winter; overwinter

item.Q:
Write the character:
unexpectedly; actually; to go so far as to; indeed
item.A:
竟 (strokes unavailable)
jìng
究竟 jiūjìng after all (when all is said and done); actually; outcome; result

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: to use up; to exhaust; to end; to finish; to the utmost; exhausted; finished; to the limit (of sth)
2: to exhaust
item.A:
尽 (strokes unavailable)
traditional: 盡
1: jìn 2: jǐn
尽量 (盡量) jìnliàng as much as possible; to the greatest extent 尽量 (盡量) jǐnliàng as much as possible

item.Q:
Write the character:
1: wait; treat; deal with; need; about; intending to do something
2: stay; delay
item.A:
1: dài 2: dāi
对待 (對待) duìdài treat; treatment 待命 dāimìng to await orders
